## Statistical Computing Prac 1

## Question 1

```{r}
#| echo: false

df <- airquality

## Identify rows with missing values

missing_rows <- df[rowSums(is.na(df))> 0,]
print(missing_rows)

```

The table shows the missing values as obtained from the original data.

## Question 2

```{r}
#| echo: false

new_df <- na.omit(df)  # Removing missing values

## Mean
mean(new_df$Temp)
mean(new_df$Ozone)

## StDev
sd(new_df$Temp)
sd(new_df$Ozone)

## Max
max(new_df$Temp)
max(new_df$Ozone)

## Min
min(new_df$Temp)
min(new_df$Ozone)
```

## Question 3

```{r}
#| echo: false

dat <- cars

X <- cbind(1,dat$speed) # Add a column of ones for intercept
Y <- dat$dist

beta <- solve(t(X)%*%X)%*%t(X)%*%Y
fit <- lm(Y~X, data = dat)
summary(fit)

beta
```

The analysis shows that the calculated Beta values are consistent with the values obtained from the lm function.
